data.lyric:
[ti:Shape of You]
[ar:J.Fla (제이플라)]
[al:Blossom]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Shape of You - J.Fla (제이플라)
[00:03.45]Lyrics by：Briggs/Kevin Jerome/BURRUSS/KANDI L./COTTLE/TAMEKA/MAC/STEVE/MCDAID/JOHN (GB)/SHEERAN/EDWARD CHRISTOPHER
[00:06.90]Composed by：Briggs/Kevin Jerome/BURRUSS/KANDI L./COTTLE/TAMEKA/MAC/STEVE/MCDAID/JOHN (GB)/SHEERAN/EDWARD CHRISTOPHER
[00:10.35]The club isn't the best place to find a lover
[00:12.52]So the bar is where I go
[00:14.13]
[00:15.47]Me and my friends at the table doing shots
[00:17.73]Drinking fast and then we talk slow
[00:19.39]
[00:20.44]Come over and start up a conversation with just me
[00:22.76]And trust me I'll give it a chance now
[00:25.26]Take my hand stop
[00:26.35]Put van the man on the jukebox
[00:27.92]And then we start to dance
[00:29.37]And nowI'm singing like
[00:30.35]Do you know I want your love
[00:32.81]Your love was handmade for somebody like me
[00:36.05]Come on now follow my lead
[00:37.74]I may be crazy don't mind me
[00:40.21]Say boy let's not talk too much
[00:42.98]Grab on my waist and put that body on me
[00:46.05]Come on now follow my lead
[00:47.71]Come come on now follow my lead
[00:49.47]
[00:51.46]I'm in love with the shape of you
[00:53.18]
[00:53.85]We push and pull like a magnet do
[00:55.64]
[00:56.32]Although my heart is falling too
[00:58.10]
[00:58.87]I'm in love with your body
[01:00.40]
[01:01.39]Last night you were in my room
[01:03.13]
[01:03.82]And now my bed sheets smell like you
[01:05.70]Every day discovering something brand new
[01:08.19]
[01:08.90]I'm in love with your body
[01:10.77]Oh I oh I oh I oh I
[01:12.85]
[01:13.91]I'm in love with your body
[01:15.68]Oh I oh I oh I oh I
[01:17.67]
[01:18.83]I'm in love with your body
[01:20.63]Oh I oh I oh I oh I
[01:22.70]
[01:23.79]I'm in love with your body
[01:25.24]
[01:25.90]Every day discovering something brand new
[01:28.20]
[01:28.93]I'm in love with the shape of you
[01:30.86]One week in we let the story begin
[01:32.50]We're going out on our first date
[01:34.17]
[01:35.16]You and me are thrifty
[01:36.32]So go all you can eat
[01:37.51]Fill up your bag and I fill up a plate
[01:39.20]
[01:40.16]We talk for hours and hours about the sweet and the sour
[01:42.44]And how your family is doing okay
[01:44.21]
[01:45.31]Leave and get in a taxi then kiss in the back seat
[01:47.42]Tell the driver make the radio play
[01:49.40]AndI'm singing like
[01:50.61]Do you know I want your love
[01:52.77]Your love was handmade for somebody like me
[01:55.48]
[01:56.12]Come on now follow my lead
[01:57.86]I may be crazy don't mind me
[02:00.10]Say boy let's not talk too much
[02:02.41]
[02:02.93]Grab on my waist and put that body on me
[02:06.00]Come on now follow my lead
[02:07.71]Come come on now follow my lead
[02:09.23]
[02:11.43]I'm in love with the shape of you
[02:13.10]
[02:13.84]We push and pull like a magnet do
[02:15.48]
[02:16.32]Although my heart is falling too
[02:18.03]
[02:18.86]I'm in love with your body
[02:20.49]
[02:21.41]Last night you were in my room
[02:23.09]
[02:23.84]And now my bed sheets smell like you
[02:25.75]Every day discovering something brand new
[02:27.99]
[02:28.91]I'm in love with your body
[02:30.56]Oh I oh I oh I oh I
[02:32.68]
[02:33.87]I'm in love with your body
[02:35.09]
[02:35.61]Oh I oh I oh I oh I
[02:37.76]
[02:38.90]I'm in love with your body
[02:40.48]Oh I oh I oh I oh I
[02:42.73]
[02:43.86]I'm in love with your body
[02:45.80]Every day discovering something brand new
[02:48.20]
[02:48.88]I'm in love with the shape of you
data.trans:
[ti:Shape of You]
[ar:J.Fla (제이플라)]
[al:Blossom]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.45]//
[00:06.90]//
[00:10.35]俱乐部不是找另一半的绝佳场所
[00:12.52]所以酒吧很适合我
[00:14.13]
[00:15.47]我和朋友们百无聊赖的喝着酒
[00:17.73]我们喝的很急 却漫不经心的聊着
[00:19.39]
[00:20.44]你向我走来 开始跟我搭讪
[00:22.76]相信我 我会给你机会的
[00:25.26]牵起我的手  
[00:26.35]我们点首Van The Man的歌吧
[00:27.92]然后我们就可以翩然起舞了  
[00:29.37]此刻我的歌声像是
[00:30.35]女孩 你知道我渴望你的爱
[00:32.81]你的爱为我量身打造 专属于我
[00:36.05]来吧 听我指挥吧
[00:37.74]或许我有点疯狂 请不要介意
[00:40.21]说小子 不必多说废话
[00:42.98]将你的手搭上我的腰 贴近我吧
[00:46.05]来吧 听我指挥吧
[00:47.71]来吧 来吧 听我指挥吧
[00:49.47]
[00:51.46]我爱上了特别的你
[00:53.18]
[00:53.85]缠绵之间 我们像是磁铁般相互吸引
[00:55.64]
[00:56.32]尽管我的心早已为你沦陷
[00:58.10]
[00:58.87]你的身体让我无比眷恋
[01:00.40]
[01:01.39]昨晚你在我房间过夜
[01:03.13]
[01:03.82]今晨床单上你的香气流连
[01:05.70]每一天都焕然一新
[01:08.19]
[01:08.90]我爱上了特别的你
[01:10.77]我 我 我
[01:12.85]
[01:13.91]你的身体让我无比眷恋
[01:15.68]我 我 我
[01:17.67]
[01:18.83]你的身体让我无比眷恋
[01:20.63]我 我 我
[01:22.70]
[01:23.79]你的身体让我无比眷恋
[01:25.24]
[01:25.90]你的身体让我无比眷恋
[01:28.20]
[01:28.93]我爱上了特别的你
[01:30.86]一周时间 就让这爱情故事上演吧
[01:32.50]我们可以开始属于我们的初次约会
[01:34.17]
[01:35.16]我们都很节俭  
[01:36.32]那就随你喜欢尽情挥霍一次
[01:37.51]包包里塞满吃的 我可以装满餐盘
[01:39.20]
[01:40.16]这酸或甜足以让我们聊上几个小时
[01:42.44]你的家人还好吗
[01:44.21]
[01:45.31]坐上的士离开 我们在后座上热吻
[01:47.42]让司机打开收音机  
[01:49.40]我的歌声像是
[01:50.61]女孩 你知道我渴望你的爱
[01:52.77]你的爱为我量身打造 专属于我
[01:55.48]
[01:56.12]来吧 听我指挥吧
[01:57.86]或许我有点疯狂 请不要介意
[02:00.10]说小子 不必多说废话
[02:02.41]
[02:02.93]将你的手搭上我的腰 贴近我吧
[02:06.00]来吧 听我指挥吧
[02:07.71]来吧 来吧 听我指挥吧
[02:09.23]
[02:11.43]我爱上了特别的你
[02:13.10]
[02:13.84]缠绵之间 我们像是磁铁般相互吸引
